definitions.body: ´[[יְהוֹ]]; LXX usu. )Iwdae, A sts. )Iwiadae (2Sa 23:30 + ), LXXL )Iwad (2Sa 20:23 )waddai), father of Benaiah (David's time), in combin. ´[[בְּנׇיׇהוּ בֶּן־יְהוֹ]] 2Sa 8:18, 2Sa 20:23, 2Sa 23:20, 2Sa 23:22, 1Ki 1:8, 1Ki 1:26, 1Ki 1:32, 1Ki 1:36, 1Ki 1:38, 1Ki 1:44, 1Ki 2:25, 1Ki 2:29, 1Ki 2:34, 1Ki 2:35, 1Ki 2:46, 1Ki 4:4, 1Ch 11:22, 1Ch 11:24, 1Ch 18:17, 1Ch 27:5; [[יְהוֹיׇדָע בֶּן־בְּנׇיׇהוּ]] 1Ch 27:34 is prob. erron. inversion of the usual order; ´[[יְהוֹ]] alone only 1Ch 12:28 (where called [[הַנׇּגִיד לְאַחֲרׂן]]).

´[[יְהוֹ]], LXX usu. )Iwdae A sts. )Iwiadae etc., (chief) priest at Jerus. in time of Joash 2Ki 11:4, 2Ki 11:9, 2Ki 11:9, 2Ki 11:15, 2Ki 11:17, 2Ki 12:3, 2Ki 12:8, 2Ki 12:10, 2Ch 22:11, 2Ch 23:1, 2Ch 23:8, 2Ch 23:8, 2Ch 23:9, 2Ch 23:11, 2Ch 23:14, 2Ch 23:16, 2Ch 23:18, 2Ch 24:2, 2Ch 24:3, 2Ch 24:6, 2Ch 24:12, 2Ch 24:14, 2Ch 24:14, 2Ch 24:15, 2Ch 24:17, 2Ch 24:20, 2Ch 24:22, 2Ch 24:25, Je 29:26.
[[יוֹיׇדָע]] a builder at wall of Jerus., with Nehemiah, Ne 3:6 (LXX )Ioeiaa, )Ioeida, )Iwdae etc.)
´[[יוֹ]] son of h. p. Eliashib Ne 12:10, Ne 12:11, Ne 12:22, Ne 13:28 (LXX )Iwda, )Iwadae, )Iwiada).
